FuncDef: This command can be used to override specific attributes of the specified queue s CBS parameters.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies an integer expression of the number of kilobytes reserved for the queue. If a value of 10KBytes is needed, enter the value 10. A value of 0 specifies that no reserved buffers are required by the queue (a minimal reserved size can still be applied for scheduling purposes). Values-0 to 131072 or default.
